description: Working on my local network with PS5. Needs a bit of setup, but great once done.
works really well! highly recommend you also pair it with the startup script from their site, makes the entire bootup process much smoother.

This version of Chiaki is best for steam deck, and for PS5 users as it is more up to date that the original Chiaki and has features to utilise the Dualsense controller.

There does seem to be a small issue with the Vaapi codec at the moment though so hopefully this will get fixed, but other than that, it works great

This app is awesome for romote play for the PS5, hands down the best as it allows you to play anywhere with no lag, well that depends also on your internet speeds. But I have been enjoying using this when I want to play games late night
This is much smoother than even the native windows and mobile clients.
